question: What was the ruling period of Ibrahim Lodi?
explanation: After the death of Sultan Sikandar Lodi, Ibrahim Lodi became the Sultan of Delhi in 1517 AD and ruled till he defeated andÂ  killed at the battle of Panipat by Babur\'s invading army in 1526 AD that gave way to the emergence of the Mughal Empire in India. He was the last ruler of the Lodi dynasty.
